scripts.bootstrap: npm run bootstrap:monorepo && npm run bootstrap:example
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:node_modules && npm run clean:example
scripts.publish:next: lerna exec -- npm publish --access public --tag next
scripts.check: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test && npm run zip
scripts.reset: npm run clean:all && npm run bootstrap && npm run check
scripts.example: npm run check && cd example && npm run start
scripts.deploy: npm run check && npm run publish
scripts.pre-publish: npm run new-version && npm run routine && git commit -am '--- new version ---'
scripts.deploy:beta: npm run pre-publish && npm run publish:beta
scripts.deploy:next: npm run pre-publish && npm run publish:next
